name: SkyFlare
description: An Iridium Flare is a phenomenon caused by the reflection of solar rays onto the reflective surface of satellites which, when see from Earth,  creates ashooting star resembling effect in the sky for a few seconds along with a bright light at the flares center. SkyFlare is a simple and intuitive application that allows you to check for upcoming Iridium Flares anywhere on the planet. All you need to do is provide your location and with a push of a button you are able to see a list of Iridium Flares in the next few days for your desired location. Dont have internet access and need to see when the next flares are? Fear not, as this application also locally saves the last Flares you previously searched.  Primary Features: - Check Iridum Flares for the upcoming days; - Choose any location in the planet for your search; - Offline mode; - View details about Iridium Flare;  - Compass;
